text: Hong Kong participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Hong Kong delegation consisted of 14 athletes competing in 7 sports: aquatics (swimming), athletics, equestrian, fencing, sailing, table tennis and triathlon. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- !
